00036 double objective_function(int *x, int n)
00037 {
00038   int val=0;
00039 
00040   // compute the sum of all values in the given string
00041   // (works also for non-binary representations)
00042 
00043   for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00044     val+=x[i];
00045 
00046   // return the final value
00047   
00048   return val;
00049 }

00080 void set_num_vals(int *num_vals, int n)
00081 {
00082   // set the number of values for each string position (variable),
00083   // use 2 for binary, 3 or higher for higher candinality alphabets
00084 
00085   for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00086     num_vals[i]=3;
00087 }

00117 int is_optimal(int *x, int n, int *num_vals)
00118 {
00119   int ok=1;
00120 
00121   for (int i=0; (i<n)&&(ok); i++)
00122     if (x[i]!=num_vals[i]-1)
00123       ok=0;
00124
